# NSScrubber.Alignment.trailing

**Case**

Trailing alignment of items within the scrubber.

## Declaration

```swift
case trailing
```

## Discussion

Trailing alignment depends on the writing direction of the system language. Alignment is to the right for left-to-right languages, and to the left for right-to-left languages.

## Constants

- **NSScrubber.Alignment.center**: Center alignment of items within the scrubber.
- **NSScrubber.Alignment.leading**: Leading alignment of items within the scrubber.
- **NSScrubber.Alignment.none**: No preference for item alignment.
